      • getInstance

        public static NotificationsController getInstance()

      • sendWaitingListEmailNotification

        public void sendWaitingListEmailNotification​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> details)
        Sends an email notification to a user on the waiting list once a booking becomes active. Tailors the message based on the time until the scheduled visit.
        Parameters:
        List - that contains The booking details for which the notification is sent.

      • sendWaitingListEnteranceEmailNotification

        public void sendWaitingListEnteranceEmailNotification​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> details)
        Sends an email notification to a user about successfully entering the waiting list.
        Parameters:
        List - that contains The booking details for which the notification is sent.

      • sendConfirmationEmailNotification

        public void sendConfirmationEmailNotification​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> details)
        Sends a booking confirmation email notification to a user.
        Parameters:
        List - that contains The booking details for which the confirmation is sent.

      • sendConfirmationWithoudReminderEmailNotification

        public void sendConfirmationWithoudReminderEmailNotification​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> details)
        Sends a booking confirmation email notification to a user, without a reminder. Used in the park entrance for sending invoices.
        Parameters:
        List - that contains The booking details for which the confirmation is sent.

      • sendCancellationEmailNotification

        public void sendCancellationEmailNotification​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> details,
                                              java.lang.String reason)
        Sends a booking confirmation email notification to a user.
        Parameters:
        List - that contains The booking details for which the confirmation is sent.
        reason - the reason for the cancellation

      • sendReminderEmailNotification

        public void sendReminderEmailNotification​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> details)
        Sends a reminder email notification to a user about their upcoming booking.
        Parameters:
        List - that contains The booking details for which the reminder is sent.

      • sendEmail

        public static void sendEmail​(java.lang.String to,
                             java.lang.String subject,
                             java.lang.String textMessage)
        Core method for sending an email using SMTP protocol.
        Parameters:
        to - The recipient's email address.
        subject - The subject line of the email.
        textMessage - The body text of the email.
